Title: Hermoso Silencio
Writer: Jorge A. Jimenez (story), Jorge A. Jimenez
Actors: Jorge A. Jimenez, Carmen Salinas, Brad Maule, Eryn Brooke
Plot: Hermoso silencio (Beautiful Silence) is a film that tells the story of a man (Cruz) born and raised in the mountains of north Mexico, unaware of modern society. After his Parents death he ...
